teammember.name: Frank Hubbert
teammember.title: Science Fiction Novelist
teammember.bio: Frank Hubbert was born to Suzy and James Hubbert on a cold November day in Liverpool, England.

teammember.name: James Gallway
teammember.title: Classical Flautist
teammember.bio: James hales from the land of Ireland. His home country plays a role in influencing his original music and style of playing.

teammeber.name: Xina
teammeber.title: Warrior Princess
teammeber.bio: Xina has over 20 years of experience fighting bad guys and she's pretty cool.
